backFields.label: Certificate Details
backFields.value:
Certificate ID: LIFT-CERT-V5-2025Q4
Holder: Raul Hernandez
Series: 2025Q4

Issue Date: March 15, 2024
Maturity Date: March 15, 2029 (60 months)

Maturity Value: $3,780 USD
Deposited to Date: $250
Projected Annual Growth: 20%

This certificate represents your participation in the Exchange Reserve regenerative capital framework through the Capitol Fund.

backFields.label: Engagement & Progression
backFields.value:
Current Phase: ◉◉◉○○ Engagement (Phase 3 of 5)

Progression Path:
Phase 1-2: Onboarding ✓
Phase 3: Engagement ← You are here
Phase 4: Residency (Next)
Phase 5: Anchorship (Final)

Unlocked Benefits:
• Access to Impact Briefings
• Priority event notifications
• Community forum access

Next Phase Unlocks:
• Private placement access
• Quarterly liquidity windows
• Governance participation

backFields.label: Your Priorities & Upcoming Events
backFields.value:
Selected Impact Priorities:
• Community Living
• Resilient Infrastructure
• Food & Farming

You'll receive invitations to learning events, private placements, and impact announcements aligned with these priorities.

Next Impact Briefing:
Capitol Fund Quarterly Update
November 15, 2025 @ 6:00 PM
Bell Tower Hall, Frederick MD

You'll receive a geofenced notification when you're near the venue.

backFields.label: Issuer Structure & Verification
backFields.value:
Organizational Hierarchy:
LocalFund → Capitol Fund → Exchange Reserve → LIFT Trust

• LocalFund: Community-facing brand
• Capitol Fund: Regional capital pool
• Exchange Reserve: Meta-ledger operator
• LIFT Trust: Delaware Statutory Trust (DST) series

Verify Certificate:
https://exchangereserve.netlify.app/verify/LIFT-CERT-V5-2025Q4

Scan QR code or visit link to view complete certificate details and transaction history.

backFields.label: Support & Trust Disclosures
backFields.value:
Contact & Support:
Email: hello@exchangereserve.org
Phone: +1 (949) 202-6850
Website: https://exchangereserve.org
Dashboard: https://afluant.com

Legal Disclosure:
This certificate represents participation in a regenerative capital framework. It is not a traditional security or investment product. Maturity values are projections based on Capitol Fund performance and community impact metrics.

Holders may qualify for priority access to future offerings based on engagement phase and contribution history. Geographic restrictions may apply.

Complete Terms:
